Title: Living at an Angle
Writer: Robia Rashid (created by), D.J. Ryan (staff writer), Bob Smiley (consulting producer)
Actors: Keir Gilchrist, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Brigette Lundy-Paine, Amy Okuda
Plot: Sam loses his portfolio for his art school application and panics. Megan gets flirty with Doug, who makes a decision about Elsa. Julia calls Miles.
